db.juhaku.juhakudb.util

Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.juhaku.juhakudb.util.ReflectionUtils

  • public class ReflectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by juha on 06/04/16.

    This class provides utilities for making reflection easier.

    Since:
    1.0.2

    • Method Detail

      • findField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field findField(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                java.lang.String name)
        Method looks for specific Field from given clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class whose field is looked for.
        name - String name of the field to look for.
        Returns:
        found Field otherwise null.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • findIdField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field findIdField(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Method searches field with annotation Id through declared fields of given class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - instance of entity class to look for id field.
        Returns:
        Field if found; otherwise null.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getGenericFieldType

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class<?> getGenericFieldType(T type)
        Returns field type of generic fields of given class. e.g. for List<Type> the Type is returned.
        Parameters:
        type - instance of Field.
        Returns:
        Class representing generic type of given field. If field does not have generic type null will be returned.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getFieldType

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class<?> getFieldType(T type)
        Returns field type for given Field. If field is generic then generic type will be returned if field type is object then the object will be returned.
        Parameters:
        type - instance of Field.
        Returns:
        Class representing type of the field.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getClassGenericTypes

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class[] getClassGenericTypes(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Get generic types of class. If class is not generic sub class of generic super class exception will occur.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Generic sub class of generic super class.
        Returns:
        Class array instance of generic types of super class.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getClassGenericTypes

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class[] getClassGenericTypes(TypedClass<T> typedClass)
        Get generic type classes with by providing instance of TypedClass. This can be used to query generic type without class being subclass of generic super class. See more details TypedClass
        Parameters:
        typedClass - Typed class that provides sub classing for type that need to be returned.
        Returns:
        Class array representing types of typed class.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getFieldValue

        public static final <T> T getFieldValue(java.lang.Object type,
                                        java.lang.reflect.Field field)
        Get value of field from given object.
        Parameters:
        type - Object to query field value from.
        field - Field to query value from.
        Returns:
        Value of given field in given object or null if exception occurs.
        Since:
        1.0.2
